text: “Ni tingaasokonesyeje kusyene, soni tingaatandikasyeje isako yaunami, ni tingaachisyeje kuti akasijeje mawiwi ga ilango, ni tingaachisyeje soni kuti akagalausyeje chipago chagumbidwa ni Allah.” Sano jwachantende shetani kuwa nkun'gosa jwakwe kunneka Allah, nikuti pamasile paapelelwe kupelelwa kwakuonechela
